Entries.default: "You there! You ain't allowed in this area!"
"Bloody seas!" The pirate jolts, falling a half-step backward as she scrambles to draw her firearm.
[Back away with your hands up.] "My mistake."
The pirate, more dirty than she is tanned, spits at the ground before stepping forward to escort you back the way you came.
"Are you a deaf bilge rat? I said you can't be here!"

"Aye, surely you're asking for it. Ain't you, swabby?"

She runs a tongue over her uneven teeth before raising a horn to her lips. Her chest puffs as she takes a deep breath.
"If Brutal Ben's made a deal with you, you must be a real shark of a captain. I'm told I'm to let you go about as you please."
